data.apiNameCn: 国内按订单运价计算（订单）
data.introduce: 国内按订单的运价计算服务主要是根据客户提供的订单号进行国内运价自动计算和运价信息录入PNR，返回该订单适用的运价结果。
data.business:
按订单的国内运价自动计算（对应主机的 PAT:A 指令）支持指定订单号进行运价计算和运价信息录入PNR（对应主机的SFC指令）。
在PAT:A中节点@SeqenceType表示回显的价格排序方式，@PriceAmount为PAT回显的条数。
data.functions:
支持根据 订单号 进行运价计算+运价信息录入PNR。 
支持对多种旅客类型同时进行运价计算+运价信息录入PNR。
支持指定运价基础进行运价计算+运价信息录入PNR。
支持指定大客户编码进行运价计算+运价信息录入PNR。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内按订单运价计算请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfoSummary","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"AirTravelerAvail","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客信息，指定旅客类型、数量等","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客类型、数量信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码：如：9901075","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirTraveler","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"乘客信息","children":[{"name":"TravelerRefNumber","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客引用序号","children":[{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客标识，可标识旅客在PNR中的序号：如果不是成人旅客，必须输入旅客序号，格式：数字，在0-9之间","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"PaymentDetail","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付信息","children":[{"name":"@PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付类型：该类型为枚举，具体的定义见下面的说明。目前只支持：CASH（现金） CREDIT_CARD（信用卡） 两种方式。","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FlightReference","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"基础运价信息：可以指定基础运价","children":[{"name":"@FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价基础代码","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightRefNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段序号","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"1..2","default":"","description":"PNR号和ORDER信息","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"公司代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"值，订单号或PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类型，PNR和ORDER","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TransactionIdentifier","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"指令标识：PAT：进行运价； SFC：将运价计算的结果存到PNR。 若不传则默认PAT。","children":[]},{"name":"@FareRefRPH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价序号RPH：当TransactionIdentifier为SFC时，必填。表示选择要存储运价的RPH。","children":[]},{"name":"@SeqenceType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PAT回显价格条数方式（H：由高到低；L:由低到高）","children":[]},{"name":"@PriceAmount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"显示价格的条数","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内按订单运价计算响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PricedItineraries","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价行程信息集合","children":[{"name":"PricedItinerary","type":"array","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价行程信息","children":[{"name":"AirItineraryPricingInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"ItinTotalFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"总价信息","children":[{"name":"BaseFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"基本票价","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税信息集合","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCodes","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价基础信息集合","children":[{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"运价基础信息代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 带大客户编码-运价计算.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
    </POS>
    <TravelerInfoSummary>
        <AirTravelerAvail>
            <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT"/>
        </AirTravelerAvail>
        <PaymentDetail PaymentType="CREDIT_CARD"/>
    </TravelerInfoSummary>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="HQ6R3B" ID_Context="PNR">
        <CompanyName Code="9901075"/>
    </BookingReferenceID>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="230418112757d5a97e9" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<OTA_AirPriceRS>
    <PricedItineraries>
        <PricedItinerary>
            <AirItineraryPricingInfo>
                <ItinTotalFare RPH="0">
                    <BaseFare Amount="2150.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="60.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    </Taxes>
                    <FareBasisCodes>
                        <FareBasisCode>Y</FareBasisCode>
                    </FareBasisCodes>
                </ItinTotalFare>
            </AirItineraryPricingInfo>
        </PricedItinerary>
    </PricedItineraries>
</OTA_AirPriceRS>

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191"/>
    </POS>
    <TravelerInfoSummary>
        <AirTravelerAvail>
            <PassengerTypeQuantity Code="INF"/>
            <AirTraveler>
                <TravelerRefNumber RPH="1"/>
            </AirTraveler>
        </AirTravelerAvail>
        <PaymentDetail PaymentType="CASH"/>
    </TravelerInfoSummary>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="KWLR2H" ID_Context="PNR"/>
    <BookingReferenceID ID="230418104038a8dbb4a" ID_Context="ORDER"/>
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<OTA_AirPriceRS>
    <PricedItineraries>
        <PricedItinerary>
            <AirItineraryPricingInfo>
                <ItinTotalFare RPH="0">
                    <BaseFare Amount="220.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    <Taxes>
                        <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="0.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                        <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="0.0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
                    </Taxes>
                    <FareBasisCodes>
                        <FareBasisCode>YIN90</FareBasisCode>
                    </FareBasisCodes>
                </ItinTotalFare>
            </AirItineraryPricingInfo>
        </PricedItinerary>
    </PricedItineraries>
</OTA_AirPriceRS>
